name: Beamrider (itch)
description:
This prototype was made for Pizza Jam 3 2018.

We learned a lot from this experience and it was a ton of fun.   Our team was very busy with other obligations, but I couldn't be happier with the work we completed.

Level Design - RoflWorld("Rofl")

Lead Programmer - Pikethorn("Sparky")

3D Moddeling - Abigail Foulke ("Peaches")

Animation - Pikethorn("Sparky")

Special thanks to Big Bird for his moral support
